Author: ch6ris#5240
Content: i.e maybe you claim once a week, locktime needs to be set for 1 hour before rewards start accruing. you could end up with 50 hours over the year without rewards accruing.

Author: DmanXX#2257
Content: I‚Äôm claiming every month

Author: ch6ris#5240
Content: at the exact moment in time they stop accruing? I don't know much. But my math shows its pretty damn close to 5%. I have seen very minor variables.

Content: Also I‚Äôm using kmd calc

Content: what is your address? maybe you have a lot of small utxo which do not accrue

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content: ok

Author: ch6ris#5240
Content: Well when you claim it should create one utxo plus another for the rewards.

Author: DmanXX#2257

Author: DmanXX#2257

Content: workaround is send the transaction to yourself twice.

Author: DmanXX#2257
Content: The thing is that kmd atomic calculator is showing completely different amount from what I am getting in Agama

Author: DmanXX#2257
Content: It could be a glitch

Author: ch6ris#5240
Content: I doubt it. It isn't perfect. The change to claiming once a month was only made recently. You would need 12 months of perfectly timed claims to really see the full picture.

Author: ch6ris#5240
Content: it went from claiming once every 12 months to once a month. which theoretically increased the possible rewards by .1%

Author: DmanXX#2257
Content: And my payout is smaller by few kmd

Author: ch6ris#5240
Content: Someone more experienced could chime in, I have seen no problem on my end they are not always perfect but I assume it will average out over the year.

Author: DmanXX#2257
Content: Can any of the developers look into it?

Author: ch6ris#5240
Content: I honestly don't think there's a problem. @CHMEX ^^^

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content: ok I will have a look tonight (EU) with a seed that needs to be spend anyways

Author: DmanXX#2257
Content: Cool let me know if you need anything from me

Author: ch6ris#5240
Content:
`APR rate: 5.111%

Expenses not included in calculation: 0.0012 KMD in transaction fees, 12 hour(s) gap period when no rewards are accrued.

Your actual amounts will be less than what is presented in the table.

Q: What will happen to my KMD rewards after 1 year period is passed.

A: It will stop accruing and remain fixed until it is claimed.`

Author: DmanXX#2257
Content: Yes I understand but It wouldn‚Äôt be few KMD

Author: pbca26#5430
Content:
5% per year not per month!
have a look at monthly breakdown on atomicexplorer's rewards calc and compare to your actual claimed rewards

Author: ch6ris#5240
Content:
`Changes to KMD rewards past block height 1 000 000:

    new KMD coins are rewarded to users when they make transactions
    total rate is ~5.1% per year if done monthly or more often
    you stop getting rewards if you haven't used Komodo network for one month (coins haven't moved in one month)
    new changes don't affect rewards accrued under old rules`

Author: tonystark2099#9565
Content: i am playing around with komodo-cli. wondering which commands i need to use to figure out how much dividends i have and how i can claim them...i used help command however there are no obvious command for this...thanks in advance

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: getbalance

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: sendtoaddress balance - 0.0001 <dest>

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: where dest can be any address you control, but simplest if it is the passphrase based address as you know you have a backup

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: then the change will be the claimed rewards

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: getinfo will show the approx amount that is available to claim
